translation.es: Es increíblemente atractivo. Te veo el lunes. Zorra.

translation.en: D'accord. Bonsoir. Happy birthday.
Happy birthday. I've had such a lovely night.
translation.es: Feliz cumpleaños. Ha sido una noche genial.

translation.en: So nice to hang out with...
If I throw up in my bed, I'm gonna sleep in yours, OK?
translation.es: Si vomito en mi cama, dormiré en la tuya.

translation.en: OK.
- I'm going to be sick. - Yeah?
And then I am going to be so anal with you.
translation.es: Y luego seré obsesiva y anal contigo.

translation.en: Welcome to the family, Lu.
Oh, yeah, I think I'm just gonna find somewhere else to...
No. No! You are staying here.
Because you are special to him,
so you are special on me.
translation.es: así que eres especial para mí.

translation.en: Yeah, I think it might be weird. Why would it be weird?
translation.es: - Creo que sería raro. - ¿Por qué sería raro?

translation.en: - It wouldn't be weird. - It wouldn't be.
Good! Good.
- Thanks, Kate. - Pfft! I'm chill.
- So that's cool that... - Yeah, it's gonna be.
- Yeah. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Entonces, genial. - Sí, será... - Sí. - Sí, genial.

translation.en: - Yeah, cool. - Cool.
